content: finished measurements approx 5 wide by 63 long unstretched * this scarf can be made in any weight or any fiber experiment with something else for a slightly different look * the stitch pattern is over an even number of stitches to make wider or skinnier add or subtract in multiples of 2 * big thick yarn works up fast but don t try to move fast - move nice and slow your hands and wrists will thank you and your scarf will still work up quickly yardage range is to incorporate the variety of gauges possible the scarf as written takes 83 yds one skein of the twinkle yarn
